serviceDescriptionCosmetology:
Modern cosmetology offers effective ways to solve skin problems, prolong its youth and maintain health. Different types of equipment and cosmetics are used for this purpose. 

Our salon offers:

serviceDescriptionHair:
You need to maintain the beauty and health of your hair constantly. Curls are affected by our diet, lifestyle, stress levels, environment and other factors. But it often happens that there should be an important event where you need to shine, but the hair is in poor condition. Hair care treatments will help to effectively eliminate dullness, dryness and other symptoms. 

Our salon offers:
serviceDescriptionListHair: Haircuts for men and women - 200 UAH, Keratin straightening - 1000 UAH, Botox for hair - 1000 UAH, Hair reconstruction - 1000 UAH
